title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, May 22, 2021
description: “Mister Rogers’ Neighborhood” premiered on this day in 1967. The creation of Fred Rogers, a minister and puppeteer, who spoke to children of peace, patience, and diversity.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
